tool_description: With the Voter Verification API, you can now onboard with confidence knowing that the individuals you onboard are holding a valid Voter Card issued by the Government of India, are eligible to vote, and have provided you with reliable identity and address proofs.
name: Voter verification
title: Voter verification

api_list.name: Voter
api_list.description: With the Voter Verification API, you can now onboard with confidence knowing that the individuals you onboard are holding a valid Voter Card issued by the Government of India, are eligible to vote, and have provided you with reliable identity and address proofs.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://voter-verification1.p.rapidapi.com/Getvoterfulldetails"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "voter-verification1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://voter-verification1.p.rapidapi.com/Getvoterfulldetails"
